name: places/ChIJMSSxPeVYwokR-ERsBPneCfs
adrFormatAddress: 1060 5th Ave #1B, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Dr Hon is a skilled surgeon.  He took care of me and spent time to explain my condition and my options.   Most importantly, he made sure my pains were well managed and I understood my condition and the procedures performed so that my recovery was a lot easier without complication.   Without his care, I don’t know how much and longer that I would have to endure.   The office ladies were nice and  insurance paper was handled efficiently.  I highly recommend his care.

Most importantly, he made sure my pains were well managed and I understood my condition and the procedures performed so that my recovery was a lot easier without complication. originalText.text: Dr. Hon saved my life when my rectum was taken over by endometriosis. It was a very complex and extensive surgery where I had an ileostomy setup for a few months. The lower the area affected by endometriosis in the rectum, the more dangerous the surgery. Dr. Hon is very special to me because he repaired my body. I’m able to use the bathroom the regular way as I no longer need the ileostomy. He’s someone who truly cares about your health and has a plan with next steps. He and his team of surgical specialists is definitely the healthcare team you should definitely seek for surgical advice. The staff is really informative as well. They have surgical coordinators hotline in addition to the regular reception/front desk. :)

originalText.text: An excellent surgeon. His surgical team and staff at Lenox Hill Hospital were extremely caring and professional. Dr. Hon is someone who explains everything medically in a down to Earth way. I would highly recommend him.

originalText.text:
There are no social distancing practices in this very small office.
A morning appointment had to wait an over hour and a half to see the Dr, while packed in with 8 (plus staff) other people.
I would definitely not go to this doctor, your health is not an obvious priority.
I don't know how this is a thing with a doctor it is unethical and unconscionable

originalText.text: Dr. Hon is an incredible surgeon! Super nice, down to earth, just an excellent doctor and person. Highly recommend him! 5 stars all around!
